participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Curious and expressive, Amina often reflects on her past while looking forward to new experiences.
participant_1.background: now i live in the united states. my aunt helped me escape when i was of. i was born in somalia. i was forced to marry when i was a. i like to dance.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and hardworking, Ethan is passionate about law and has a strong connection with his family's equestrian roots.
participant_2.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for a generations. i am from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm.
